channel.title: Tempest Removed MySQL [NO CREDITS] FIXED!
channel.description:
Credits to Flight [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,490482.0.html]++PLEASE LOOK HERE FOR ORIGINAL TEMPEST THREAD++[/url]
Credit given wherever it needs to be(Palidino, Mrquarter, Damien, COUE etc.).
All I did was remove the code causing you to have to have a forum database so the characters load from .txt's. I also edited a few drops and added a temporary method of giving certain players Extreme, and also fixed a bug or two. Download Link [Includes Server, Cache and Client]: [URL=http://up.ht/reJngF]Tempest - REMOVED MYSQL.rar - 33.7 Mb[/URL] For extreme, just find: [code]String[] extreme = {[/code] and add your username in. Again i don't claim any credits. Remove if necessary, just posting to help those who can't get it removed. I can't really add pictures, just go look [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,490482.0.html]here[/url]. [size=12pt]READ:[/size] playerRights was simply commented out and I guess it used to be loaded from MySQL but anyways: To fix playerRights, open the player class and find: [code]} else if (token.equals("character-rights")) {[/code] Once you find it un-comment: [code]//playerRights = Integer.parseInt(token2);[/code] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/828/unledwch.jpg/][IMG]http://img828.imageshack.us/img828/8828/unledwch.jpg[/img][/URL] Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]

item.dc:creator: @RedFalconBlue RedFalconBlue
item.description:
@RedFalconBlue wrote:

once you add your username to String[] specials you have to compile. Also you could try rights of 2 and 1 but regardless of your rights number, even if it’s 3, you have to add your name to String[] specials for any of the owner commands.
